sense.def:
A proportion of an amount or group
je del neke količine ali skupine.

seg.quote: Courts are now sending a smaller proportion of offenders to prison.

sense.def:
The proportion of one part of a group
je velikost enega dela skupine v primerjavi z vso skupino ali nekim drugim njenim delom.

seg.quote: The proportion of workers to employers was large.
Usually men outnumber women, but we have about equal proportions at Sussex.

sense.def:
Z besedo
proportions
označujemo velikost nečesa.

seg.quote: ...a gin and tonic of giant proportions.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj majhno ali veliko
in proportion to another thing
, je majhno ali veliko, če ga primerjamo z nečim drugim.

seg.quote: Babies have big heads in proportion to their bodies.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
out of all proportion to something else
, je veliko večje ali resnejše, kot bi moralo biti.

seg.quote: Every small event was magnified out of all proportion to its importance.

sense.def:
To have a sense of proportion
pomeni vedeti, kaj je resnično pomembno in kaj ne.
